summary: Core Internet Identity sign-in/out UI and a Principal-keyed profile backend/onboarding flow were added. However, the diff appears to modify/add files that were explicitly marked immutable, and there is no direct evidence that the required generated image assets were added under the specified public path.

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not make changes to immutable frontend paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows these immutable paths being added/changed (they appear in the added files list), which violates the constraint/AC that they must not be edited.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generated images are saved under frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced directly by the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend components reference images under /assets/generated, but the diff does not show any files added under frontend/public/assets/generated (the omitted files are unspecified, so asset presence cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary).

hallucinated_features.description: Admin/access-control secret token initialization via URL parameter (caffeineAdminToken) and access control initialization on actor creation.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on switching auth to Internet Identity and adding Principal-keyed profiles; it does not request an admin-token URL parameter flow or access-control secret initialization behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Blob storage mixin integration for handling profile pictures (ExternalBlob/Storage mixins).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 requires a profile picture field, but the specific addition of blob-storage mixins and ExternalBlob upload-progress plumbing is not explicitly requested in the BuildRequest (it may be a valid implementation choice, but it is additional scope beyond the stated requirements).
